shortForecast: Chance Freezing Rain then Patchy Fog
name: Today
detailedForecast: A chance of freezing rain and patchy freezing fog before 10am, then a chance of freezing rain and patchy fog between 10am and 11am, then a chance of freezing rain and a chance of rain and patchy fog between 11am and noon, then patchy fog and a slight chance of freezing rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 36. Northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.
